alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Panola (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:56AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lafayette and northeastern Panola Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1156 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over John W Kyle State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... John W Kyle State Park, Burgess and Hayes Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
